description: Fast, free, no restrictions, easy to use, I like it a lot more than Zoom
Perfect, it's now even available as flatpak. Easy to install and secure

Think twice before installing ZOOM or MS Teams because they don't respect your privacy. They keep asking for the money through subscription and plans like beggars instead they could've just asked me for couple of change and I'd donate them but, no they want to play a social game. This software is actually good. Thanks for reading
summary: use this instead of ZOOM or Microsoft Teams

description: I recommend it over using it in Firefox, since the Video looks a lot better!
Not sure I'll update. Why does this flatpack ask for permission to view any file in my homefolder..?
summary: Why does this flatpack ask for permission to view any file in home?

description: Integrated into Matrix clients and makes video conferencing enjoyable with less concern over AI scanning my facial expressions.
summary: Blows Zoom out of the water

description:
I wanted to try it with a course that I am preparing. I installed it and it was very laggy and extremly slow.
I will continue to use Skype - not perfect but better.
summary: Extremely slow with sharing the screen!

description: Jitsi Meet works great for my use case. Small home office connected to the main office - used for quick calls.
I was under the impression that this was open source but Links to microsoft and google put me off this chat app
Screw that registering fir a game of soldiers

Darüber hinaus, dass sich quasi keine Einstellungen vornehmen lassen, wie beispielsweise das Beitreten ohne aktiven Kamera, scheint die flatpak Version auch Probleme beim Ausführen zu haben: Nach der Installation funktioniert alles wunderbar, sobald die Anwendung aber geschlossen und erneut geöffnet wird, kommt es zu einem Fehler: Failed to connect to the bus: Failed to connect to socket /run/dbus/system_bus_socket: Datei oder Verzeichnis nicht gefunden. Wenn ich anschließend versuche `system.bus.socket` manuell bei den Berechtigungen der Flatpakanwendung hinzu zu fügen (Was ich als normaler Anwender eigentlich NIE tun sollen müsste) startet die Anwendung ohne Fehlerausgabe immernoch nicht.

In diesem Zustand also leider unbrauchbar

L'application est énergivore.
L'utilisation de JitsiMeet draine moins la batterie avec un navigateur internet (https://meet.jit.si/) ou en WebApp.
